data.description:
In "XR Designer" crafting your unique and stunning room is a breeze.
Browse through numerous official 3D models and wallpapers to design your space, or upload your own creations for a personalized touch.
Borrow them from your friends and get inspired.
(Uploads can be made through the related service at https://xrsns.com.)

Save, load, and edit your designs at any time to perfect your vision.
Explore your friends' rooms for ideas and invite them to experience your creations.

Unleash your creativity and design a captivating room that is truly your own in "XR Designer."
(Detailed operating instructions can be found at https://xrsns.org.)


◆List of Functions◆
Summon models
Change wallpapers
Switching windows
Change the weather
Change background music
Saving a room
Load a room
Share created rooms
Check your own data
Volume control
Switch language

◆Controls◆
Move with the left controller stick.
Rotate with the right controller stick.
The upper trigger on the right controller operates the menu panel.

◆How to manipulate the 3D model◆
Please do the below with the laser on the 3D model.

Move: Move with the left controller stick.
Zoom in/out: Click the B button on the right controller.
Rotate: Click the A button on the right controller.
Reset rotation: Double-click the A button on the right controller.
Gravity: Click the X button on the left controller.
Delete: Click the bottom trigger on the right controller.

◆Special thanks◆
BGM: (C)K.Y. (C)L-side (C)効果音ラボ
Model: (C)3D Shaker
Image: (C)Pixabay

Solved the problem of the keyboard being difficult to start up. Reduced the load on the hardware. Improved the display during maintenance, etc. 
キーボードが立ち上がりにくい問題を解決しました。 ハードにかかる負荷を軽減しました。 メンテナンス時等の表示を改善しました。

ハードにかかる負荷を軽減しました。

Fixed some minor points.
細かい点を直しました。

Improved details.
細かい点を改善しました。

Fixed minor points.
細かな点を修正しました。

Updated logo and other designs.
ロゴ等のデザインを更新しました。

Security has been enhanced by eliminating unnecessary modules. Minor bugs have been fixed.
不必要なモジュールを排除しセキュリティーを強化しました。軽微なバグを直しました。

Removed unnecessary modules that were added with the version upgrade.

バージョンアップに伴い追加されてた不要なモジュールを取り外しました。

This is a major version upgrade.
Minimum Android API level accordingly has been changed from 23 to 29.
The load has been greatly reduced and shadows are now more natural.

メジャーバージョンアップです。
これに伴い最小Android APIレベルが23から29に変更されました。
負荷を大幅に軽減して影をより自然にしました。

Improved stability of asynchronous-related processing.

非同期関連の処理の安定度を高めました。
Fixed a bug regarding the changes made with the addition of warp and gravity operations. Lightened the laser operation. ワープと重力操作の追加に伴う変更に関してのバグを直しました。レーザー操作を軽くしました。
